TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AccessKeyManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 维护所有访问键的注册和 Windows Forms、Win32 和 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 之间互操作键盘命令的处理。

span.span: Maintains the registration of all access keys and the handling of interop keyboard commands between Windows Forms, Win32, and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用每一个按需创建对象。An object is created on demand with one per . 作为的事件处理程序附加公开到方法和访问密钥。The is attached as an event handler for and exposes methods to and access keys. 按下的已注册的访问密钥时，调用目标元素上的方法。When the registered access key is pressed, the calls the method on the target element. 元素可以包含任意数量的访问密钥相关联。An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
